entry.summary:
Observed at: Lake Superior Provincial Park 6:00 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
Temperature: 3.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.6 kPa falling
Humidity: 97 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: SE 14 km/h gust 28 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers this evening. A few flurries beginning near midnight. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming south 20 gusting to 50 early this evening then southwest 40 gusting to 60 before morning. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:07 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature steady near minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Local amount 5 cm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near minus 4. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:07 PM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
